file.title: Name

p.text: All objects in Algorithm2 are addressed by names. Using this property you can unambiguously specify an object which you want to work with.

p.textAll: An object can have absolutely any name, the main thing is that you should exactly know what object is at the back of the name.

remarks.text: In fact several objects can have same names, but they must have different indices. In this case objects are united into a useful construction which is called Array.
